website_summaries.verdict: The ideal fondue pot for the dessert enthusiast on a budget.
pros: Serving bowl and serving tray are removable and easy to transfer to the table or counter for parties
Melting and warming settings keep chocolate warm for hours
cons: Smaller size and only suitable to melt chocolate, not cheese

customer_reviews.title: So sharp I almost need stitches.
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware! This worked great until I cleaned it. The edge of the little metal bowl is so sharp that it sliced right into my finger when I was washing out the chocolate. So deep I almost need stitches. No joke. You Just don’t expect that from this little bowl. Be carful! I’m contacting the company but wanted to also warn buyers.
